short_summary: Renovation of a culvert floor on Highway 93S at km 101 in Kootenay National Park
description: this posting is the 2nd stage of a two stage solicitation process, presurveating the water course(including water diversion) to (culvert preparation and cleaning),supply and installation of reinforced concrete floor(including all dowels and water stops)
full_summary:
### Solicitation Notice

#### Stage 2 - Highway 93S Km 101 Culvert Renovations – Kootenay National Park

Reference number: cb-8225-68989594

##### Description of the Opportunity

Parks Canada seeks proposals from qualified contractors to undertake renovations to a culvert floor on Highway 93S at km 101 in Kootenay National Park. The work entails the preservation of Sinclair Creek, including water diversion, culvert preparation and cleaning, and the supply and installation of a reinforced concrete floor, complete with dowels and water stops.

This posting is the second stage of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage consisted of evaluating the qualifications of all interested suppliers. The second stage invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project, based on the specifications and drawings. Only qualified suppliers will be invited to submit a bid.

#### Supply and Delivery Requirements

* **Revision date**: 2023-08-30
* **Contract start date**: 2023-08-28
* **Contract end date**: 2023-11-15
* **Unspsc Category**: 72141000 (Highway and road construction services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada
* **Contracting entity**: Parks Canada 
* **Contact information**:
	+ Name: Jen Maheu
	+ Email: jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (587) 432-8458

Note that the tender has been cancelled. However, the information listed above is for reference purposes only. If you require further clarification or have questions regarding this opportunity, please do not hesitate to contact the contracting entity for more information. 

The government now uses a UN spanish website (UNES) the contract number.
